      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<CupcakeBottom> getAllBottoms()
      Creates an arrayList of all cupcakebottoms with its two values (String variant, int price) from the database and then returns it as CBList
      ArrayList<CupcakeTopping> getAllToppings()
      Creates an arrayList of all cupcaketoppings with its two values (String variant, int price) from the database and then returns it as CTList
      void getBalance(User aUser)
      Gets the current balance of a user, taken from the database.
      CupcakeBottom getBottom(String name)
      Gets the values "variant" and "price" of a cupcakebottom, by its string name, from the database.
      CupcakeTopping getTopping(String name)
      Gets the values "variant" and "price" of a cupcaketopping, by its string name, from the database.
      User getUserInfo(String uName, String password)
      Gets the username and password getUserInfo Check if its valid, by comparing the info from the database If string password is not correct, it returns a user with "Wrong pass" as name If the username is also incorrect, it returns a user named "Error"
      boolean insertUser(String name, String pass)
      Creates a user, with the parameters name and password, and stores it in the database.
      void updateBalance(User aUser)
      Sets a users balance, and puts it in the database, based on the username If username doesnt exists, it makes an exception

    • Method Detail

      • getUserInfo

        public User getUserInfo(String uName,
                        String password)
        Gets the username and password getUserInfo Check if its valid, by comparing the info from the database If string password is not correct, it returns a user with "Wrong pass" as name If the username is also incorrect, it returns a user named "Error"
        Parameters:
        uName - is the username
        password - is the password for login, connected to the username
        Returns:
        aUser

      • getBottom

        public CupcakeBottom getBottom(String name)
        Gets the values "variant" and "price" of a cupcakebottom, by its string name, from the database. Then it will return the chosen cupcakebottom with its two values.
        Parameters:
        name - which is the name of the bottom type
        Returns:
        CuocakeBottom

      • getTopping

        public CupcakeTopping getTopping(String name)
        Gets the values "variant" and "price" of a cupcaketopping, by its string name, from the database. Then it will return the chosen cupcaketopping with its two values.
        Parameters:
        name - which is the name of the topping type
        Returns:
        topping that has been chosen

      • getAllToppings

        public ArrayList<CupcakeTopping> getAllToppings()
        Creates an arrayList of all cupcaketoppings with its two values (String variant, int price) from the database and then returns it as CTList
        Returns:
        a full list of cupcaketoppings

      • getAllBottoms

        public ArrayList<CupcakeBottom> getAllBottoms()
        Creates an arrayList of all cupcakebottoms with its two values (String variant, int price) from the database and then returns it as CBList
        Returns:
        a full list of cupcakebottoms

      • updateBalance

        public void updateBalance(User aUser)
        Sets a users balance, and puts it in the database, based on the username If username doesnt exists, it makes an exception
        Parameters:
        aUser - who is the user thats going to get the updated balance

      • getBalance

        public void getBalance(User aUser)
        Gets the current balance of a user, taken from the database. It throws an exception, if the user doesnt exist
        Parameters:
        aUser - the user we are getting the balance of

      • insertUser

        public boolean insertUser(String name,
                          String pass)
        Creates a user, with the parameters name and password, and stores it in the database. The user gets the start balance of 0 If name and/or password isnt a string, it will throw an exception and return false. At last it will return true, if its made correctly and add the user
        Parameters:
        name - which is the made up username
        pass - which is the password thats connecting to the username
        Returns:
        true if the userinfo is valid
